summary: Terrorism is when people use violence to achieve their political goals, often targeting innocent civilians. It aims to create fear and insecurity, forcing changes in policies. The term became widely known during conflicts in the 1970s. Modern terrorism uses tactics like suicide attacks, as seen in the 9/11 incident where a plane hit the World Trade Center in 2001. Many groups, from various political and religious backgrounds, have used terrorism. It's a serious global issue, causing thousands of deaths and incidents worldwide.
title: Terrorism
